name: Alien Intelligence (PR Games)
description:
Has school ever made you feel inadequate? Like your low grades are signs of stupidity?
If so, I hope you resonate with this short story I made for a school project.  The game is best played in Fullscreen!

You play as Timmy, a boy who starts questioning his intelligence and self worth until... well, play and see ;) !

The missing art will be updated once I get enough spare time to focus on it.  And apologies in advance if you found the puzzles too complicated :").
